sourcesContent:
<template>
  <g id="popup" :transform='transform'>
    <defs>
    <filter id="f3" x="0" y="0" width="300%" height="300%">
      <feOffset result="offOut" in="SourceAlpha" dx="1" dy="1" opacity='0.1'/>
      <feGaussianBlur result="blurOut" in="offOut" stdDeviation="2" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="blurOut" mode="normal" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
    <g id="label">
        <path filter='url(#f3)' d="M4.5,18 L5.32907052e-15,13.5 L4.5,9 L4.5,2 C4.5,0.8954305 5.3954305,2.02906125e-16 6.5,0 L134,0 C135.104569,-2.02906125e-16 136,0.8954305 136,2 L136,25 C136,26.1045695 135.104569,27 134,27 L6.5,27 C5.3954305,27 4.5,26.1045695 4.5,25 L4.5,18 Z" id="Combined-Shape" fill="#000000"></path>
        <text class='label uppercase' id="text-label">
            <tspan x="30" y="17">{{goal}}</tspan>
        </text>
    </g>
  </g>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'PopUpRight',
  props: {
    goal: String,
    transform: String
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
@import "library/src/style/variables.scss";

.goal {
  stroke: $color-blue;
  fill: none;
}

#text-label {
  fill: white;
  font-family: $font-sans;
}

.netzero {
  fill: black;
}
</style>
